InstructionData.Title: Arc Furnace Sorters
InstructionData.Author: MrDrummer25
InstructionData.Instructions:
alias CentrifugeSorter d0 alias SmeltableSorter d1 alias SiloSorter d2 alias IceSorter d3 Start: # Sorters: # - Centrifuge Sorter (Dirty Ore, Space Ore) # - Smeltable Sorter (Ore minus Coal, Cobalt, Hydrocarbon, Uranium Ore) # - Silo Sorter (Ingots, Coal, Cobalt, Hydrocarbon, Uranium Ore) # - Ice Sorter # - Everything else (Rejection) s CentrifugeSorter Mode 1 # Match Any move r0 HASH("ItemDirtyOre") sll r0 r0 8 or r0 r0 SorterInstruction.FilterPrefabHashEquals put CentrifugeSorter 0 r0 move r0 HASH("ItemSpaceOre") sll r0 r0 8 or r0 r0 SorterInstruction.FilterPrefabHashEquals put CentrifugeSorter 1 r0 move r0 HASH("ItemReagentMix") sll r0 r0 8 or r0 r0 SorterInstruction.FilterPrefabHashEquals put CentrifugeSorter 2 r0
s SmeltableSorter Mode 1 # Match Any move r0 HASH("ItemIronOre") sll r0 r0 8 or r0 r0 SorterInstruction.FilterPrefabHashEquals put SmeltableSorter 0 r0 move r0 HASH("ItemCopperOre") sll r0 r0 8 or r0 r0 SorterInstruction.FilterPrefabHashEquals put SmeltableSorter 1 r0 move r0 HASH("ItemGoldOre") sll r0 r0 8 or r0 r0 SorterInstruction.FilterPrefabHashEquals put SmeltableSorter 2 r0 move r0 HASH("ItemSiliconOre") sll r0 r0 8 or r0 r0 SorterInstruction.FilterPrefabHashEquals put SmeltableSorter 3 r0 move r0 HASH("ItemSilverOre") sll r0 r0 8 or r0 r0 SorterInstruction.FilterPrefabHashEquals put SmeltableSorter 4 r0 move r0 HASH("ItemLeadOre") sll r0 r0 8 or r0 r0 SorterInstruction.FilterPrefabHashEquals put SmeltableSorter 5 r0 move r0 HASH("ItemNickelOre") sll r0 r0 8 or r0 r0 SorterInstruction.FilterPrefabHashEquals put SmeltableSorter 6 r0
s SiloSorter Mode 1 # Match Any move r0 HASH("ItemIronIngot") sll r0 r0 8 or r0 r0 SorterInstruction.FilterPrefabHashEquals put SiloSorter 0 r0 move r0 HASH("ItemCopperIngot") sll r0 r0 8 or r0 r0 SorterInstruction.FilterPrefabHashEquals put SiloSorter 1 r0 move r0 HASH("ItemGoldIngot") sll r0 r0 8 or r0 r0 SorterInstruction.FilterPrefabHashEquals put SiloSorter 2 r0 move r0 HASH("ItemSiliconIngot") sll r0 r0 8 or r0 r0 SorterInstruction.FilterPrefabHashEquals put SiloSorter 3 r0 move r0 HASH("ItemSilverIngot") sll r0 r0 8 or r0 r0 SorterInstruction.FilterPrefabHashEquals put SiloSorter 4 r0 move r0 HASH("ItemLeadIngot") sll r0 r0 8 or r0 r0 SorterInstruction.FilterPrefabHashEquals put SiloSorter 5 r0 move r0 HASH("ItemNickelIngot") sll r0 r0 8 or r0 r0 SorterInstruction.FilterPrefabHashEquals put SiloSorter 6 r0 move r0 HASH("ItemCharcoal") sll r0 r0 8 or r0 r0 SorterInstruction.FilterPrefabHashEquals put SiloSorter 7 r0 move r0 HASH("ItemCoalOre") sll r0 r0 8 or r0 r0 SorterInstruction.FilterPrefabHashEquals put SiloSorter 8 r0 move r0 HASH("ItemUraniumOre") sll r0 r0 8 or r0 r0 SorterInstruction.FilterPrefabHashEquals put SiloSorter 9 r0 move r0 HASH("ItemCobaltOre") sll r0 r0 8 or r0 r0 SorterInstruction.FilterPrefabHashEquals put SiloSorter 10 r0
s SiloSorter Mode 1 # Match Any move r0 HASH("ItemIce") sll r0 r0 8 or r0 r0 SorterInstruction.FilterPrefabHashEquals put SiloSorter 0 r0 move r0 HASH("ItemNitrice") sll r0 r0 8 or r0 r0 SorterInstruction.FilterPrefabHashEquals put SiloSorter 1 r0 move r0 HASH("ItemOxite") sll r0 r0 8 or r0 r0 SorterInstruction.FilterPrefabHashEquals put SiloSorter 2 r0 move r0 HASH("ItemVolatiles") sll r0 r0 8 or r0 r0 SorterInstruction.FilterPrefabHashEquals put SiloSorter 3 r0
